Name: Porta
Description: Porta's ecosystem relay chain honours the core ethos of decentralisation through pooled security. Connected to the relay chain are parachains optimised for industry sectors. Companies can take advantage of this configuration by leasing parachain slots to fulfil their business objectives.The Porta ecosystem provides the ability for users to mint NFT's for images, audio and games, this links to a frontend marketplace enabling those NFT's to be traded.Telegram | Discord | MediumWhitepaperÂ
